messagesList.name: John Doe
messagesList.message: Hey Tom! How are you doing today?

messagesList.name: Jenn Chan
messagesList.message: Have you heard about the miniature memory city that is being built in Chula Vista?

messagesList.name: Jane Doe
messagesList.message: Do you have time this week to grab coffee?

messagesList.name: Ella Phillips
messagesList.message: My mom is irritated at the moment, do you have advice on how to soothe her?

messagesList.name: Stephen Jackson
messagesList.message: Which counselor can help me with health insurance?
